snippet.title: Spiral Trailer - Announcement
snippet.description:
Here is our newest trailer for Spiral, featuring for the first time Mike Drew as Bernard!

Be sure to wishlist us on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1579390/Spiral__Episode_1/

Spiral is a narratively driven third-person exploration game that shares a poetic vision of cognitive degenerescence seen from the inside.

The game tells the story of Bernard, a man who wishes goodbye one last time to the memories that made him who he is today. We journey alongside him, witnessing his life and remembering for him as his mind slowly unravels into the Void.
